troubleshooting.title: Glossentries refered using glossref element are not displayed

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse
author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

condition.title: Condition
condition.p: I have some glossentry declared inside a glossgroup topic then refered through a glossref inside my map.
When I add an abbreviated-form linked to one of my glossentry, the entry isn't resolved in the PDF output.

steps-informal.p: Set each glossref print attribute value to "yes".<glossref keys="first-entry" href="path/to/glossgroup.dita#first-entry" print="yes"/>
Declare each glossentry element inside a keydef in the ditamap:<keydef keys="first-entry" href="path/to/glossgroup.dita#first-entry"/>
